attributes.action: Dramatically increase the supply of housing by relaxing local planning restrictions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The purpose: to ensure the supply of homes meets the huge demand for them, and therefore allow the housing market to properly clear and ensure more affordable properties for everyone.  We as a nation have to accept that although preservation of the countryside is a worthwhile objective, it is more important that everyone has the opportunity to live in a decent affordable house.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
